name: Game About Squares: Colour Labels
description: Adds colour names into squares, circles and corners. You know what: accessibility, daltonists and so on.
additional_info: Quick hack for Game About Squares; if that game gets a new theme or change structure, this style will most probably break. Not sure about colours names; change `content`s to your liking (maybe just 'A','B','C','D' would be most appropriate for playing?). It is also possible change actual colours with CSS3 patterns (or images). I have tried but haven't achieved anything pleasant. Changelog: 2014-08-03 Fixed level 21: disabled patterns and re-introduces labels. Disabled rotation at level 29. HN
